Question.Subject: Can someone tell me why I am having trouble accessing a certain section of this websight?
Question.Content: Ok they updated their websight and now I am having trouble with the patient login section. There is no SUBMIT button and it does not allow you to read all the text in that section. I am even having trouble submitting a complaint about the websight on that websight. So if you go there click on patient login on upper left corner and tell me what you see, does it require a special application or version of an application that I don't have intstalled? Does it require having high speed access? http://www.haltomorthodontics.com/
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Try going to the website,, not the websight,, that is your problem.. ~
Edit : You are just trying to get views on a site.. you have no issues , except you can not spell
Edit : use this if you have an issue.. http://www.haltomorthodontics.com/offices/contact-us/
